defaultCurrency.label: Default Currency
defaultCurrency.helperText: In which currency you want to see countings, totals and so on?

defaultLanguage.label: Default Language
defaultLanguage.helperText: What is your default language for news, push notifications, app translation?

financialProfileAllocationSavings.label: Savings Allocation %
financialProfileAllocationSavings.helperText: How much of your 'free' money you want to put on build your significant savings? Would be passed to debts, if you already have enough savings.

financialProfileAllocationDebts.label: Debts Allocation %
financialProfileAllocationDebts.helperText: How much (in %) of your 'free' money you want to put on debts payout? Would be passed to either savings (if not enough), or to investmens (if enough savings)if you have no debts/credits.

financialProfileAllocationInvestments.label: Investments Allocation %
financialProfileAllocationInvestments.helperText: How much(in %)  of your 'free' money you want to put on investments?
